#Webical Features

== Feature list ==

  * Read and Edit iCalendar files stored anywhere
  * support for iCalendar standard
  * Progessive Enhancement

== Feature details ==

 === Progressive Enhancement ===
 We believe that the application should be build with accessibility as it's foudation. The application should in principle be accessible to anyone, the fancy/juicy bits are extras. This does not mean we don't include juicy features, there just not the foundation for the use of our application.
